columns.id: The unique identifier for each TV series.
columns.Episode: The title of the individual episode.
columns.Air_Date: The date the episode was broadcasted.
columns.Rating: The overall rating of the episode.
columns.Share: The percentage of viewers during the episode's airing.
columns.18_49_Rating_Share: The rating share for viewers aged 18 to 49.
columns.Viewers_m: The number of viewers in millions for the episode.
columns.Weekly_Rank: The episode's rank position for the week.
columns.Channel: The identifier for the channel airing the episode.

TV_series.table_description: The table holds data related to TV series episodes and their performance.

columns.id: The unique identifier for each TV channel.
columns.series_name: The name of the series associated with the channel.
columns.Country: The country where the channel is based.
columns.Language: The primary language of the channel's content.
columns.Content: The type of content primarily aired on the channel.
columns.Pixel_aspect_ratio_PAR: The pixel aspect ratio used by the channel.
columns.Pay_per_view_PPV: The pay-per-view availability of the channel.
columns.Package_Option: The subscription package options available for the channel.

TV_Channel.table_description: The table holds information regarding various TV channels and their attributes.

columns.id: The unique identifier for each cartoon.
columns.Title: The title of the cartoon episode.
columns.Directed_by: The name of the director of the cartoon.
columns.Written_by: The name of the writer of the cartoon.
columns.Original_air_date: The original date the cartoon first aired.
columns.Production_code: The production code assigned to each cartoon episode.
columns.Channel: The identifier for the channel airing the cartoon.

Cartoon.table_description: The table holds data related to various cartoon episodes and their details.
